language: Language for speech input and output. 2-letter ISO language code.

mpd.server: Hostname of the MPD server on your local network
mpd.port: Port number of the MPD server on your local network

calendar.serverURL: The CalDAV URL. For NextCloud/ownCloud, log in with a browser, go to the [Calendar] app, [Settings] at the bottom left, and copy the [Copy the primary CalDAV URL]
calendar.username: Your username on the CalDAV/NextCloud/ownCloud server

hue.hostname: The IP address or hostname of your Hue Bridge on your local network
hue.auth: The authentication credential to your Hue Bridge. This is effectively a password.

audio.maxCommandLength: Finish the voice command after N seconds, e.g. when there is too much noise.
audio.inputDevice: ALSA ID of the microphone audio device, e.g. hw(2,1), for 1. card 2. device. See aplay -l for a list. Empty = default device.
audio.outputDevice: ALSA ID of the speaker audio device, e.g. hw(1,0). Empty = default device.

deepSpeech.modelDir: DeepSpeech Model directory. Convenience parameter to specify model, lm and trie at the same time.
deepSpeech.lm: Language model binary file, created with deepspeech/data/lm/generate_lm
deepSpeech.trie: Language model trie file, created with deepspeech/native_client/generate_trie
deepSpeech.beamWidth: DeepSpeech: Beam width for the CTC decoder

maryTTS.url: URL of the MaryTTS server, usually running locally
maryTTS.voice: The MaryTTS voice name, e.g. cmu-rms, dfki-spike, dfki-prudence or cmu-slt-hsmm. Download them by running  ./gradlew runInstallerGui  in the marytts directory.
